title: PHPgettype()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPgettype()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
Example
content_sections.code:
"; $b = 3.2; echo gettype($b) . "
"; $c = "Hello"; echo gettype($c) . "
"; $d = array(); echo gettype($d) . "
"; $e = array("red", "green", "blue"); echo gettype($e) . "
"; $f = NULL; echo gettype($f) . "
"; $g = false; echo gettype($g) . "
"; ?>

summary: This tutorial covers PHPgettype()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPgettype()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PHPgettype()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
